name: Nailed It (austindkoenig)
description:
Nailed It is a game jam submission for VimJam! It features a finger whose goal is to collect as many colors of nail polish as possible! 

This game was made by Little_Aurelia and FunkyMonk420.

The idea, design, and art was done by Little_Aurelia.

The programming and sounds were done by FunkyMonk420.

Little_Aurelia: https://little-aurelia.itch.io/
